text: Evil Con Carne is an American animated television series. It was created by Maxwell Atoms. It was originally shown on Cartoon Network. It began on 2003 and ended on 2004. It focuses on a the brain of a devil playboy with a Spanish accent attached to the body of his pet demon bear who wants to collect the rest of his organs for world domination. It originated as a part of Grim & Evil before it was split into two shows. == Cast == * Phil LaMarr as Hector Con Carne * Grey DeLisle as Major Doctor Ghastly * Armin Shimerman as General Skarr, Stomach * Frank Welker as Boskov * Maurice LaMarche as Estroy Category:Cartoon Network series Category:The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2004 American television series endings Category:American children's television series Category:Supervillain television shows Category:Television shows about bears Category:English-language television programs Category:2000s science fiction television series
title: Evil Con Carne
